name: Nir Oren
content: Professor Nir Oren | The University of Aberdeen Professor Nir Oren Professor Nir OrenPersonal Chair, Dean for Research Performance Accepting PhDs About Email Addressn.oren@abdn.ac.ukTelephone Number+44 (0)1224 274162Office AddressMeston 222School/DepartmentSchool of Natural and Computing SciencesSchool/DepartmentSenior Vice Principals External Memberships FHEA Research Research Overview I work in multi-agent systems, specialising in formal argumentation, computational trust theory, and norm-based reasoning. Research Areas Accepting PhDs I am currently accepting PhDs in Computing Science. Please get in touch if you would like to discuss your research ideas further. Email Me Computing Science Supervising Accepting PhDsView Research Area Research Specialisms Artificial IntelligenceOperational Research Our research specialisms are based on the Higher Education Classification of Subjects (HECoS) which is HESA open data, published under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International licence.
